projects.name: Insagram
projects.description: Insagram-clone for educational purpose where you can create posts and like each others post a place to connect with others

projects.name: tapp
projects.description: Tapp is an innovative event management system designed to revolutionize the way events are organized and run. As the lead developer of this project, I successfully spearheaded the creation of a seamless and efficient platform that allows event attendees to place orders directly through our website, eliminating the need for a middle man to manage counters or handle sales for our clients.

projects.name: Vignette
projects.description: Vignette is an extraordinary e-commerce project that stands out as a testament to my expertise in delivering exceptional online shopping experiences. As the lead developer for this Shopify-based project, I led the development and successful launch of a feature-rich e-commerce website that specializes in selling vignettes, granting users the freedom to drive in various countries for specified durations.

projects.name: Elysee
projects.description: Elysee represents a groundbreaking collaboration with Dietiest, revolutionizing the healthcare industry by providing an AI-powered platform to facilitate weight reduction and personalized diet planning. As a key member of the development team for this Rails-based project, I played a crucial role in crafting a sophisticated system that empowers patients to fill out detailed forms, while enabling doctors to leverage AI algorithms to suggest highly tailored and effective diet plans.
